languages.text: "Ты вновь с нами, красный жрец, и рвешься в бой. Отрадно видеть, что не только тело твое, но и воля — из прочнейшего металла".

traits.locale_text: "Ты вновь с нами, красный жрец, и рвешься в бой. Отрадно видеть, что не только тело твое, но и воля — из прочнейшего металла".

languages.text: "You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."
languages.original_text: "Ты вновь с нами, красный жрец, и рвешься в бой. Отрадно видеть, что не только тело твое, но и воля — из прочнейшего металла".

traits.locale_text: "You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."
"You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."
"You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."
"You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."
"You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."
"You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."

languages.text: «Ha vuelto con nosotros, sacerdote rojo, y dispuesto a luchar. Es bueno comprobar que tanto su cuerpo como su voluntad están forjados con el más resistente de los metales».
languages.original_text: "You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."

languages.text: 「赤き法師よ、あなたは再び我らのもとにあり、戦うことを熱望している。あなたの体だけでなく、その意思が強靭な金属でできていることがわかってよかった」
languages.original_text: "You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."

languages.text: “你又回到我们身边了，红袍神甫，而且你很渴望战斗。最坚硬的金属组成的并不仅仅是你的身体，你的意志也同样坚不可摧。”
languages.original_text: "You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."

languages.text: "Ihr seid wieder bei uns, roter Priester, und Ihr brennt darauf, zu kämpfen. Es ist gut, zu sehen, dass nicht nur Euer Körper, sondern auch Euer Wille aus hartem Metall besteht."
languages.original_text: "You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."

languages.text: « Vous êtes de nouveau parmi nous, prêtre rouge, et vous êtes impatient de vous battre. Il est bon de voir que, comme votre corps, votre volonté est faite du métal le plus solide. »
languages.original_text: "You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."
"You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."

languages.text: "Kızıl rahip, yine aramızdasın. Savaşmaya da heveslisin. Yalnızca bedeninin değil, aynı zamanda iradenin de en kuvvetli metalden yapılma olduğunu görmek güzel."
languages.original_text: "You are with us again, red priest, and you are eager to fight. It is good to see that not only your body but also your will is of the strongest metal."
